blocking_issues.description: correctness issues identified by the top-ranked reviewers (B and C). Specifically: 1) A likely runtime error in `ranker.py` using `model_copy` on a Memory object that may not support the injected `provenance` field or be Pydantic V2 compatible. 2) A design flaw where `rank_with_provenance` overwrites original memory provenance with retrieval metadata, destroying source tracking. 3) Missing token budget enforcement in `build_project_block`. These issues prevent production deployment."
